title: QuasiGovernmentIssuerType
description: Represents a class to allow specification of different types of Quasi Government collateral.

sovereignEntity.description: True if sovereign entity (e.g. not separate legal personality from sovereign) or false if non-sovereign entity (e.g. separate legal personality from sovereign).

sovereignRecourse.description: Applies to non-sovereign entity (e.g. separate legal personality from sovereign).  True if entity has recourse to sovereign (e.g. debt guaranteed by government).  False if entity does not have recourse to sovereign.
